amendment.purpose: An amendment offered by Mr. George Miller (CA) to prohibit federal funds from certain indicted organizations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller, George amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Miller, George.
